remarks.format: ## Remarks `ListViewArray`類別會提供相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 的執行階段功能`ListView`陣列。The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array. 它不會提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於使用者編輯項目的標籤時。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AfterLabelEdit`使用者完成修改項目的文字時，就會發生事件。The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 使用者輸入項目的新字串會傳遞至事件和事件處理常式可以拒絕變更。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件處理常式會拒絕變更，文字會在使用者開始編輯項目之前時，還原為文字。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. 為了讓`AfterLabelEdit`會引發事件屬性控制項必須設為`true`。In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BeforeLabelEdit`使用者開始修改項目的文字時，就會發生事件。The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件處理常式取消這個事件，則使用者無法變更的文字。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text. 您可以使用這個事件，若要防止使用者編輯中的特定項目的控制項。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果的屬性控制設為`false`，則`BeforeLabelEdit`不會引發事件; 若要變更項目標籤的所有使用者嘗試會自動被都拒絕。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理此事件可讓更新項目資訊保留在快取，使它隨時可用。Handling this event enables the to update the item information held in cache so that it is readily available. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於按一下 中的 時。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式。The `Click` event passes a to its event handler. 因此它只表示已發生按一下。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更特定的滑鼠資訊 （按鈕按一下、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 不過，如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，不會引發事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定應視為按兩下，而不是點選兩次滑鼠按鍵的時間。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`按兩下控制項時，每次引發事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`並事件[控制](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)，則`Click`和按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，控制項不支援事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ColumnClick`事件發生於使用者按一下資料行標頭中的項目詳細資料檢視中的其中一個控制項 (當屬性設定為)。The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). `ColumnClick`通常處理事件，以排序中的項目，使用為資料行的按資料行來排序。The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the , using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於資料行標頭順序已變更時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ColumnReordered`事件可取消的事件，而且可以處理事件，並將取消[System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel)屬性設`true`。The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the [System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel) property to `true`. 不過，如果取消事件，則的不會變更為值。However, if the event is canceled, the of the will not change to the value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DragEnter`當使用者第一次將滑鼠游標停留在控制項拖放作業期間，會引發事件。The `DragEnter` event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀使用主控描繪的控制項。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 會引發此事件時，才屬性設定為`true`並屬性設定為`View.Details`。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to `View.Details`. 控制項中每個資料行標頭，就會發生此事件。This event can occur for each column header in the control. 如需有關主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性參考主題。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GiveFeedback`啟動拖放作業時，會引發事件。The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 使用`GiveFeedback`事件中，拖曳事件來源的可修改滑鼠指標的外觀以使用者視覺化回饋提供拖放作業期間。By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ItemActivate`在使用者啟動中的一或多個項目時，就會發生事件控制項。The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 使用者可以啟用單鍵 」 或 「 按兩下，根據的值的項目屬性，或使用鍵盤。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 從內的事件處理常式`ItemActivate`事件，您可以參考或是屬性來存取集合中選取項目來判斷哪些項目啟用的。From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ItemDrag`事件發生於使用者開始拖曳項目。The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item. 通常的事件處理常式`ItemDrag`事件執行的工作，藉由呼叫拖曳方法。Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the method. 您可以使用這個事件來執行將項目拖曳入和移出您的應用程式的必要工作控制項。You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's control. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將在表單的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字元按鍵不會引發事件; 不過，非字元按鍵並會引發和事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用範例在執行階段，以使用或修改子集的常見按鍵的按鍵輸入的屬性。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將在表單的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵的事件發生順序如下：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyUp` 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用以接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將在表單的屬性事件處理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`子控制項新增或移除時的界限所控制的變更，以及其他變更時，可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 配置事件可以使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的版面配置。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項時，每個作業會引發`Layout`事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將焦點變更使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），或藉由呼叫或方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the or method, focus events occur in the following order: `Leave` 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Leave` 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於以滑鼠按一下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指標位於圖形上通常按下滑鼠按鈕時，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` 發生關閉點選兩次足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生事件，而第二個不`MouseClick`事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們通常會受到其他動作，例如按下 ENTER 鍵，且焦點在控制項時引發。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於使用滑鼠按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指標位於圖形上通常按下滑鼠按鈕時，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: 發生關閉點選兩次足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生`DoubleClick`事件，而第二個不事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a `DoubleClick` event instead of the second event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是圖形的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a shape. 它們通常會受到其他動作，例如按下 ENTER 鍵，當焦點在圖形時引發。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the shape has focus. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: `MouseDown` 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生此事件時處於虛擬模式，或呼叫方法。This event occurs when a is in virtual mode and the or method is called. 當處理這個事件，您應該計算其項目從清單中的項目屬性符合搜尋條件和設定所提供的項目`SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index`的 ListViewItem 索引的屬性。When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the Items property matches the search criteria and set the `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` property to the index of the ListViewItem. 如果未提供項目，和 FindItemWithText 會傳回 null 參考 （在 Visual Basic 中的任何動作）。If an item is not provided, and FindItemWithText will return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + tab 鍵，等等），藉由呼叫變更焦點或方法，或藉由設定屬性到目前表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法時，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果屬性設定為`false`，則和`Validated`會隱藏事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果的屬性設為`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件會隱藏事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
